page.title: 06EDUCATION IN NW NEWBURY
page.content: {PLAYGROUP}held in Speen Church Hall. {PRIMARY EDUCATION}(BERKS ED COMM):One {NURSERY & Infant School}in area plus one village {Primary school.}Most Junior aged children educated at schools just out of area,many of whom cycle or are driven to school by parents.{CROSSING {LADIES}available on major roads leading to schools. {SECONDARY EDUCATION}comprises one large (900+) co-educational comprehensive school-{SHAW HOUSE - sited around original Tudor house now undergoing extensive repair. No 6th Form provision available there. {SPECIAL EDUCATION:CASTLE SCHOOL} specialises in severely handicapped 5-16yr olds.{MARY HARE GRAMMAR SCHOOL} only accepts 11 to 18 yr olds who are deaf or hard of hearing.
